attributes.action: Stop the proposed processing of asylum seekers in Rwanda.
attributes.additional_details: Rwanda has a history of violation of human rights. It is many miles away from United Kingdom and asylum seekers are fleeing danger and looking for safety. This policy is cruel, unethical and shows Britain as a very uncaring society. We need to be kinder.
attributes.background: Rescind the policy of removing asylum seekers on a one way ticket to Rwanda.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/614913
